title: Health Data Integration for Compliance
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want a standardized API for health device data ingestion so that I can ensure our applications are built with compliance-by-design principles and maintain traceability in user interactions.

title: User-Customizable Alert Preferences
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to ensure that the health monitoring alerts system allows users to customize their alert preferences so that we can maintain compliance with privacy standards while providing a user-friendly experience that respects individual preferences.

title: Telehealth Integration for Compliance
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to ensure that the integration of telehealth services with electronic health records (EHR) maintains robust audit trails and compliance standards, so that we can provide secure and traceable user interactions while facilitating effective and personalized care.

title: Medication Management Interface – Compliance and Auditability
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead, I want the medication management interface to provide complete audit logs and notification settings for missed doses so that I can ensure compliance with privacy regulations and maintain traceability of user interactions.

title: Secure Access Controls for User Health History
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to ensure that secure access controls are in place for user health history so that I can maintain regulatory compliance and protect sensitive information while allowing developers to integrate health data seamlessly.
